string.value: The #p1063018# seems to need help. Go to #b#m105070300##k, where the doll is, and meet the #b#p1063018##k.

The #p1063018# says that he wants to put bandages on his injured master and asks that you bring him some #b#t4000035#s#k so that he can make a bandage. You can obtain #t4000035#s from the #r#o3230101#s#k that appear in the #b#m103000000# Subway#k...\r\n\r\n#i4000035# #t4000035# #b#c4000035# / 60#k

When you bring him all the #t4000035#s, the #p1063018# is touched and says that someone like you has the qualification to be in the organization that his master is in. He says that when his master returns, he will ask him to allow you into the organization...
Oh, my lifesaver! Please help my master! I don't think the potion alone is enough to heal my master. Could you please help me find a bandage I can use to wrap my master's wound?
You really are amazing, lifesaver. Please find me some #t4000035#es so I can make a bandage. If I wash the #t4000035#es and cut them, I can use them as a bandage.

You can find #t4000035#es in... Where was that... Oh, right! I heard creatures called #r#o3230101#s#k in #b#m103000000# Subway#k wear #t4000035#es over their heads. Can you eliminate those creatures and bring me #b60 #t4000035#es#k? I'm counting on you.
But... But you're my lifesaver. There isn't anyone else who will help my poor master in pain...

It's my lifesaver! Did you bring me the #t4000035#es? Wow, that's a lot! I think you have enough for me to make a bandage. You're such a lovely person, lifesaver. You deserve to be a part of my master's organization!\r\n#L0##bYour master's organization? What organization?#l\n#k

I don't know what it's called, but it's an organization of people in Maple World that secretly do good deeds! A lot of people want to join! I can pull some strings and get you into the organization!\r\n#L0##b(As a Dragon Master, you should join an organization of people who secretly do good deeds, right?) Sounds good!#l\n#k
Alright! Just leave it to me!
Have you not found the #bTableclothes#k I've requested? My master's health is deteriorating as we speak. I heard you can acquire Tableclothes from #rJr. Wraiths#k in Kerning City Subway.
